subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tuck, a defensive end who was a stalwart of two Super Bowl victories with the Giants, accepted a contract worth $11 million to join a team that finished 4-12 each of the last two seasons.
snippet: Tuck, a defensive end who was a stalwart of two Super Bowl victories with the Giants, accepted a contract worth $11 million to join a team that finished 4-12 each of the last two seasons.
